ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Observation data taken by the visible all-sky camera at Kototabang (JPEG format)
ResourceHeader.Description: The observation data taken by the visible all-sky camera at Kototabang, Indonesia (0.20S, 100.32E, 865m MSL), which has been operated on March 14, 2013. File names of observation data are composed of date and time: (year)(month)(day)_(hour)(minute).JPG. The time interval of each image is 1 minutes. Local time (UT + 07:00) is used for time data.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If you acquire Kototabang All Sky Camera data, we ask that you acknowledge us in your use of the data. This may be done by including text such as All Sky Camera data at Kototabang were provided by Research Institute for Sustainable Humanosphere of Kyoto University. We would also appreciate receiving a copy of the relevant publications.

AccessURL.Name: Kototabang All Sky Camera Observation Data

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Description: Date in the form YYYY/MM/DD where YYYY= Gregorian Year AD, MM = month of year (01-12), and DD = day of month (01-31).

Parameter.Name: time
Parameter.Description: Time in the form hh:mm:ss where hh = hour of day (0-23), mm = minute of hour (00-59) and ss = second of minute (00-59). Local time (UT+07:00:00) is used for time data.
